publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1034 Kenny MacAskill: The Draft Emergency Workers (Scotland) Act 2005 (Modification) Order 2008—That the Justice Committee recommends that the draft Emergency Workers (Scotland) Act 2005 (Modification) Order 2008 be approved. Supported by: Fergus Ewing*

S3M-1034 Kenny MacAskill: The Draft Emergency Workers (Scotland) Act 2005 (Modification) Order 2008—That the Justice Committee recommends that the draft Emergency Workers (Scotland) Act 2005 (Modification) Order 2008 be approved. Supported by: Fergus Ewing
